name: Disco Jockey (DJ)
description: Mixes music for events or clubs with Indian beats.

name: Video Jockey (VJ)
description: Hosts music or cultural shows on TV or online.

name: Radio Jockey (RJ)
description: Hosts radio shows with music or cultural commentary.

name: Bharatanatyam Choreographer
description: Designs classical dance sequences from South India.

name: Garba Dancer
description: Performs circular Gujarati dance for Navratri.

name: Chhau Performer
description: Performs martial dance from Odisha or Bengal.

name: Folk Theatre Performer
description: Acts in Nautanki or Tamasha plays.

name: Dhol Player
description: Plays the dhol drum for festivals or events.

name: Nadaswaram Player
description: Plays South Indian wind instrument for ceremonies.

name: Shehnai Player
description: Plays auspicious wind instrument for weddings.

name: Kanjira Player
description: Plays tambourine-like drum in Carnatic music.

name: Sarod Player
description: Plays fretless string instrument in classical music.

name: Sufi Singer
description: Sings devotional Sufi music with passion.

name: Fusion Guitarist
description: Blends Indian and Western guitar styles.

name: Mandolin Player
description: Plays mandolin in Indian fusion music.

name: Warli Artist
description: Paints tribal geometric art from Maharashtra.

name: Tanjore Painter
description: Paints gold-leaf adorned Tamil Nadu art.

name: Miniature Painter
description: Paints detailed Mughal or Rajput art.

name: Kalamkari Artist
description: Paints or prints on fabric with natural dyes.

name: Gond Painter
description: Paints tribal art from Madhya Pradesh.

name: Metal Engraver
description: Engraves designs on brass or silver.

name: Textile Printer
description: Prints designs on fabrics using blocks.

name: Rangoli Artist
description: Creates colorful floor art for festivals.

name: Mask Maker
description: Crafts masks for Kathakali or Chhau.

name: Costume Designer
description: Designs attire for dance or theatre.

name: Pattachitra Narrator
description: Sings while presenting Odisha scroll art.

name: Kavad Storyteller
description: Narrates Rajasthani tales with portable shrines.

name: Lyricist
description: Writes song lyrics for films or albums.

name: Poet
description: Writes poetry in Hindi, Urdu, or regional languages.

name: Calligrapher
description: Creates artistic Urdu or Devanagari script.

name: Animator
description: Creates animated visuals for films or media.

name: Filmmaker
description: Directs or produces cultural or artistic films.

name: Music Composer
description: Composes music for films or performances.

name: Sound Designer
description: Creates soundscapes for theatre or films.

name: Sufi Dancer
description: Performs whirling dance in Sufi tradition.

name: Vocal Coach
description: Trains singers in classical or modern styles.

name: Dance Instructor
description: Teaches classical or folk dance forms.

name: Tabla Accompanist
description: Plays tabla to support vocal or dance performances.

name: Fusion Drummer
description: Plays drums in Indian-Western fusion music.

name: Pakhawaj Player
description: Plays traditional percussion in Dhrupad music.

name: Ghatam Player
description: Plays clay pot percussion in Carnatic music.

name: Bansuri Maker
description: Crafts bamboo flutes for classical music.

name: Street Art Performer
description: Creates live art or performances in public.

name: Voice-Over Artist
description: Provides narration for films or media.

name: Music Arranger
description: Arranges music for orchestras or bands.

name: Chhath Song Singer
description: Sings devotional songs for Chhath festival.

name: Theatre Actor
description: Performs in traditional or modern Indian plays.

name: Flow Artist
description: Performs with props like poi or hoops in rhythmic flow.

name: Magician
description: Performs magic and illusion acts for entertainment.

name: Camera Actor
description: Acts in films or TV with emotive expressions.

name: Dancer
description: Performs classical, folk, or contemporary dance forms.

name: Circus Artist
description: Performs acrobatics or juggling in circus shows.

name: Indie/Folk Singer
description: Sings independent or regional folk music.

name: Psy DJ
description: Mixes psychedelic trance music for clubs.

name: Reggae DJ
description: Mixes reggae music with Indian influences.

name: Instrumentalist
description: Plays traditional or modern musical instruments.

name: Music Technologist
description: Creates digital music or sound effects.

name: Wall Artist
description: Paints murals on walls with cultural themes.

name: Graphic Designer
description: Creates digital art for media or branding.

name: Videographer
description: Records and edits artistic or event videos.

name: Drone Technician
description: Operates drones for aerial artistic footage.

name: Chef
description: Cooks traditional or modern Indian cuisine.

name: Baker
description: Bakes breads or desserts with Indian flavors.

name: Mixologist
description: Crafts creative cocktails with Indian twists.

name: Face Painter
description: Paints artistic designs on faces for events.

name: Makeup Artist
description: Creates looks for performances or fashion.

name: Hair Stylist
description: Styles hair for cultural or artistic events.

name: Fashion Designer
description: Designs traditional or modern Indian attire.

name: Journalist
description: Writes creative content for cultural media.

name: Trekking Guide
description: Leads adventure treks in the Himalayas.

name: City Tour Guide
description: Guides tourists through urban cultural sites.

name: Historic Tour Guide
description: Guides tours of historical Indian monuments.

name: Sports Coach
description: Trains athletes in sports like cricket or kabaddi.

name: Martial Artist
description: Practices or teaches Indian martial arts like Kalaripayattu.

name: Nutritionist
description: Advises on diet with Indian food focus.

name: Spa Therapist
description: Provides wellness treatments like Ayurvedic massage.

name: Social Science Educator
description: Teaches history or sociology with Indian context.

name: Plumber
description: Handles plumbing for homes or venues.

name: Elder Care Specialist
description: Cares for elderly with cultural sensitivity.

name: ENT Specialist
description: Treats ear, nose, and throat issues.

name: Palmist
description: Reads palms for insights into life.

name: Energy Healer
description: Performs aura cleansing or energy healing.

name: Sitarist
description: Plays the sitar in classical music.

name: Rangoli Artist
description: Creates colorful floor art for festivals.

name: Kathakali Performer
description: Enacts dramatic Kerala stories with makeup.

name: Singer
description: Performs vocal music in various Indian styles.

name: Dancer
description: Performs classical or folk dances of India.

name: Painter
description: Creates visual art using traditional or modern mediums.

name: Sculptor
description: Carves sculptures from stone, wood, or metal.

name: Musician
description: Plays instruments like sitar or tabla.

name: Actor
description: Performs in theatre or film productions.
